items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
Recommendations are generated within 2 seconds of page load.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Scalable to handle 1 million concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User input was high-level; assumed core requirement is to integrate AI recommendations into an e-commerce platform. Specifics like algorithms, UI placement, and evaluation metrics were inferred.
